channel.title: Compiling
channel.description:
ok now the reason i dont download jdk 9 is that it will take almost 2 hours. so i have version 6. things i need are a testscape versoin of:
compile code
class path code
and how to change my item spawn command. like on moparscape how its ::pickup, how do i change mine to ::item?

item.title: Compiling
item.dc:creator: @meeped meeped
item.description:
@meeped wrote:

ffs you see?

my post keeps getting gawd dam erased cause noobs fucking jsut wanna leech…

ffs ill go look it up now and you better rep me for this ;)[br][size=1]Posted at: November 04, 2006, 02:44:10 AM[/size][hr]rep me for this noob… anyways… read this and this is what you set your compiler to

@echo off
COLOR 08
title (YOURSERVERNAMEHERE) Client
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_06injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_06injava.exe” server
pause

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

copy and paste that!!!
credits to SOmthing All Over

ok so example. my jdk version is jdk-1_5_0_09-windows-i586-p

and my server name is MeepedScape

my compiler look like this.

@echo off
COLOR 08
title (YOURSERVERNAMEHERE) Client
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injava.exe” server
pause

notice the jdk1.5.0_09. so if your jdk was jdk-1_5_0_08-windows-i586-p in your compiler youd turn _09 to _08 get it

alright to get to your compiler:

go to your game files

then,

find your compiler

right click on it and hit enter

copy and paste @echo off
COLOR 08
title (YOURSERVERNAMEHERE) Client
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injava.exe” server
pause

into your compiler and change YOURSERVERNAMEHERE to your server name

then jdk.5.0_09 to your java.

if you need better help ill help you on msn…

i_r_ryan_k@hotmail.com

cya later and i hope i can help someone

if this helps make a msg below so this doesnt get erased, need it for all the ppl who dont have friends to tell them how to do thsi stuff

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling
item.dc:creator: @DAWIGG DAWIGG
item.description:
@DAWIGG wrote:

ok go to start, right lcick my computer,properties, advanced,variables,press add and add this ::

CLASSPATH
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.

Read full topic
